name: Compose Rules
description: Combine multiple rules with logic operators (AND, OR, NOT, SEQUENCE). Creates a composite rule that can be saved and reused.

logic.description: How to combine rules (AND=all must pass, OR=any must pass, NOT=negate, SEQUENCE=run in order)

description.description: Description of what the composite rule does

save_as.description: Optional rule_id to save the composite rule as

short_circuit.description: Stop on first failure (AND) or success (OR) (default: true)
